trans-unit.source: Represents an unsigned rights managed <see cref="T:System.Security.RightsManagement.PublishLicense" /> or an unsigned <see cref="T:System.Security.RightsManagement.PublishLicense" /> template.
trans-unit.target: 代表未簽署的權限管理 <see cref="T:System.Security.RightsManagement.PublishLicense" /> 或未簽署的 <see cref="T:System.Security.RightsManagement.PublishLicense" /> 範本。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.PublishLicense> defines security data about rights, users, and other security-related information.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.PublishLicense> 定義安全性權限、 使用者和相關資料，其他安全性相關的資訊。

trans-unit.source: The license defines how a specific user on a specific computer can use specified rights-managed content.
trans-unit.target: 授權會定義如何在特定電腦上的特定使用者可以使用指定的權限管理內容。

trans-unit.source: The publishing process begins with the document author, who defines rights information in an <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.UnsignedPublishLicense>.
trans-unit.target: 在發佈程序開頭的文件作者，定義中的權限資訊<xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.UnsignedPublishLicense>。

trans-unit.source: Next, the authoring application calls the <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.UnsignedPublishLicense>.<xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.UnsignedPublishLicense.Sign%2A>
trans-unit.target: 下一步，撰寫應用程式會呼叫<xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.UnsignedPublishLicense>。<xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.UnsignedPublishLicense.Sign%2A>

trans-unit.source: method to create a signed <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.PublishLicense>.
trans-unit.target: 若要建立帶正負號的方法<xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.PublishLicense>。

trans-unit.source: The signed <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.PublishLicense> can then be provided to the end-user client application which can call <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.PublishLicense.AcquireUseLicense%2A> to request an end-user <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.UseLicense>.
trans-unit.target: 帶正負號<xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.PublishLicense>再供使用者用戶端應用程式可以呼叫<xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.PublishLicense.AcquireUseLicense%2A>要求使用者<xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.UseLicense>。

trans-unit.source: The returned <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.UseLicense> then allows the client application to exercise the rights that are granted to the user.
trans-unit.target: 傳回<xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.UseLicense>然後允許用戶端應用程式，才能施行授與使用者的權限。

trans-unit.source: The document author can use the <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.UnsignedPublishLicense> class either to create a signed <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.PublishLicense>, or to build and serialize a <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.PublishLicense> template.
trans-unit.target: 文件作者可以使用<xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.UnsignedPublishLicense>類別以建立帶正負號<xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.PublishLicense>，或若要建置和序列化<xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.PublishLicense>範本。

trans-unit.source: As with other <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement> types, <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.UnsignedPublishLicense> is only usable in full trust applications.
trans-unit.target: 如同其他<xref:System.Security.RightsManagement>型別，<xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.UnsignedPublishLicense>才可用於完全信任應用程式。

trans-unit.source: XAML Text Usage
trans-unit.target: XAML 文字用法

trans-unit.source: This type is not typically used in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 此類型通常不會使用在[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.RightsManagement.UnsignedPublishLicense" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.RightsManagement.UnsignedPublishLicense" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.RightsManagement.UnsignedPublishLicense" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.RightsManagement.UnsignedPublishLicense" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.UnsignedPublishLicense> creates an empty and unsigned publish-license.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.UnsignedPublishLicense> 建立空白且不帶正負號發行授權。

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xrml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xrml-md.md)] publish-license template to use to create this license.
trans-unit.target: 用來建立此授權的 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xrml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xrml-md.md)] 發行授權範本。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.RightsManagement.UnsignedPublishLicense" /> class from a specified [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xrml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xrml-md.md)] publish-license template.
trans-unit.target: 從指定的 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xrml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xrml-md.md)] 發行授權範本初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.RightsManagement.UnsignedPublishLicense" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The `publishLicenseTemplate` [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xrml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xrml-md.md)] `<RANGETIME>` or `<INTERVALTIME>` elements are ignored when the <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.UnsignedPublishLicense> is created by the <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.UnsignedPublishLicense.%23ctor%2A>(String) constructor.
trans-unit.target: `publishLicenseTemplate` [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xrml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xrml-md.md)] `<RANGETIME>`或`<INTERVALTIME>`元素會被忽略時<xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.UnsignedPublishLicense>由<xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.UnsignedPublishLicense.%23ctor%2A>（字串） 建構函式。

trans-unit.source: To specify these values for the publish license, the <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentGrant> properties for <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentGrant.ValidFrom%2A> and <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentGrant.ValidUntil%2A> must be explicitly set.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定發行授權，這些值<xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentGrant>屬性<xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentGrant.ValidFrom%2A>和<xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentGrant.ValidUntil%2A>必須明確設定。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to explicitly set the <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentGrant.ValidFrom%2A> and <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentGrant.ValidUntil%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何明確設定<xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentGrant.ValidFrom%2A>和<xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentGrant.ValidUntil%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use this constructor.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例將示範如何使用這個建構函式。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the publisher-created content identifier.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定發行者建立的內容識別項。

trans-unit.source: The publisher-created rights-managed content identifier.
trans-unit.target: 發行者建立之受版權管理的內容識別項。

trans-unit.source: The publisher creates a <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.UnsignedPublishLicense.ContentId%2A> to identify rights-managed content in a <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.UseLicense> and a <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.PublishLicense>.
trans-unit.target: 「 發行者 」 建立<xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.UnsignedPublishLicense.ContentId%2A>來識別中的版權管理內容<xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.UseLicense>和<xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.PublishLicense>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of assigned user rights.
trans-unit.target: 取得已指派使用者權限的集合。

trans-unit.source: A collection of the assigned user rights that are provided in this license.
trans-unit.target: 已指派使用者權限的集合，由這份授權所提供。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of name and description pairs.
trans-unit.target: 取得名稱與描述配對的集合。

trans-unit.source: A collection of name and description pairs.
trans-unit.target: 名稱與描述配對的集合。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the content owner.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定內容擁有者。

trans-unit.source: The user who owns the published content.
trans-unit.target: 擁有發行內容的使用者。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.UnsignedPublishLicense.Owner%2A> specifies the user who owns the <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.PublishLicense>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.UnsignedPublishLicense.Owner%2A> 指定的使用者擁有<xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.PublishLicense>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.UnsignedPublishLicense.Owner%2A> is also associated with the Owner node in the issuance license [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xrml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xrml-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.UnsignedPublishLicense.Owner%2A> 也會與在發行授權擁有者節點相關聯[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xrml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xrml-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use this property to assign a <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用這個屬性來指派<xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the contact name for the author or publisher of the content.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定內容作者或發行者的連絡人姓名。

trans-unit.source: The contact name for the author or publisher of the content.
trans-unit.target: 內容作者或發行者的連絡人姓名。

trans-unit.source: XAML Text Usage
trans-unit.target: XAML 文字用法

trans-unit.source: Members of this type are not typically used in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 這個類型的成員不通常會以[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the contact [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] for the author or publisher of the content.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定內容作者或發行者的連絡 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: The contact [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] for the author or publisher of the content.
trans-unit.target: 內容作者或發行者的連絡[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: XAML Text Usage
trans-unit.target: XAML 文字用法

trans-unit.source: Members of this type are not typically used in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 這個類型的成員不通常會以[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: The secure environment for license activation and binding.
trans-unit.target: 授權啟用與繫結的安全環境。

trans-unit.source: A returned <see cref="T:System.Security.RightsManagement.UseLicense" /> for the document author.
trans-unit.target: 傳回的文件作者 <see cref="T:System.Security.RightsManagement.UseLicense" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a signed <see cref="T:System.Security.RightsManagement.PublishLicense" /> and returns a <see cref="T:System.Security.RightsManagement.UseLicense" /> for the document author.
trans-unit.target: 建立已簽署的 <see cref="T:System.Security.RightsManagement.PublishLicense" />，並傳回文件作者的 <see cref="T:System.Security.RightsManagement.UseLicense" />。

trans-unit.source: The signed <see cref="T:System.Security.RightsManagement.PublishLicense" /> that is created by signing this <see cref="T:System.Security.RightsManagement.UnsignedPublishLicense" />.
trans-unit.target: 已簽署的 <see cref="T:System.Security.RightsManagement.PublishLicense" />，這是透過簽署這份 <see cref="T:System.Security.RightsManagement.UnsignedPublishLicense" /> 而建立的。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use this class to initialize a <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.PublishLicense>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用這個類別來初始化<xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.PublishLicense>。

trans-unit.source: Returns a serialized template created from the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xrml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xrml-md.md)] of the <see cref="T:System.Security.RightsManagement.UnsignedPublishLicense" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回從 <see cref="T:System.Security.RightsManagement.UnsignedPublishLicense" /> 之 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xrml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xrml-md.md)] 建立的序列化範本。

trans-unit.source: A serialized template created from the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xrml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xrml-md.md)] of the <see cref="T:System.Security.RightsManagement.UnsignedPublishLicense" />.
trans-unit.target: 從 <see cref="T:System.Security.RightsManagement.UnsignedPublishLicense" /> 之 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xrml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xrml-md.md)] 建立的序列化範本。
